scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yml --output-template-file output.yml --s3-bucket app-repo-components
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file output.yml --stack-name api-lambda-send-email-ses --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.qd: npm run package && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:test: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file output.yml --stack-name api-lambda-send-email-ses --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides FromEmail=alexander.simovic@gmail.com
